remarks: Closure of ring multiplication for a left module.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmodmcl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmodmcl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmodmcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) $.
lmodmcl $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. K /\ Y e. K ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. K ) $.
